Text: Thanks! The show was originally recorded by BBC on nov 2, 1979 at Hammersmith Odeon, London. This recording is incomplete and the missing songs are: Sin City, Bad Boy Boogie, The Jack, Whole Lotta Rosie and Rocker. The opening song of the concert is misplaced - Live Wire (as track 9 but should be track 2).

Thanks for the info! :)
Yes, I know, I wish they had aired the whole show, would have been great to have Sin City there!
Just search for this show on other torrents sites and I'm sure you'll find the whole show.
